subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Davis Love III fared better than he imagined after a two-month break, opening with a five-under 65 in the Sony Open in Honolulu to share the first-round lead with five other golfers.
snippet: Davis Love III fared better than he imagined after a two-month break, opening with a five-under 65 in the Sony Open in Honolulu to share the first-round lead with five other golfers.
